response.original_title: This is How We Dream: A Video Archive for the Year 20XX, when the last cat dies, marking the end of a species
response.overview: In a speculative gesture toward a future without beloved species, this film places playful domestic imagery of cats interacting with historical artifacts of extinct animals against the backdrop of environmental collapse. At once surreal and deeply felt, it creates an imagined archive for a world on the brink, filled with humor, grief, and absurd tenderness.
response.title: This is How We Dream: A Video Archive for the Year 20XX, when the last cat dies, marking the end of a species
